bashrc_key2: `.bashrc` naam se ek `file` aapki `home directory` mei hogi. Jab bhi aap `terminal` ka naya session kholte ho, toh woh `file` `execute` ho jaati hai.
bashrc_key3: Aap uss `file` ko apne kisi bhi pasand ke `editor` mei khol kar, yeh content paste karein.
bashrc_key4: Ab aap `file` ko `save` kar kar, close kar sakte hai.
bashrc_key5: Ab aap ek naya `terminal` ka window khol kar dekhein.
bashrc_key6: Agar aapne galti nahi ki hogi, toh aapko apne `terminal` mei "I am learning programming" dikhega.
bashrc_key7: Dhyaan rakhein kyuki `file` `tab` `execute` hoti hai - jab naya `terminal` khulta hai toh, isliye, purane `terminal` mei koi change nahi dikhayi dega.
bashrc_key8: `.bashrc` `file` mei aap koi aur bhi program call kar sakte hai. Jaise, yeh contents `.bashrc` `file` mei daalein:
